SELECT
    MAX(LEN(LocationID)) as Len_locationid,
    MAX(Len(Borough)) as Len_Borough,
    MAX(len(Zone)) as Zone,
    MAX(len(service_zone)) as Len_service_zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@bmksynapsedemodl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--- use with clause to provide explict datatypes-----------
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://bmksynapsedemodl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    with (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )AS [result]

--specify utf8 collation  
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://bmksynapsedemodl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    with (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    )AS [result]
------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery
COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

use nyc_taxi_discovery

SELECT name, collation_name from sys.databases
